message: layers[3]: "type" is prohibited for ref layers
layers[3]: "source" is prohibited for ref layers
layers[3]: "source-layer" is prohibited for ref layers
layers[3]: "filter" is prohibited for ref layers

layers[5]: ref cannot reference another ref layer
layers[8]: layer "vector-raster-mismatch" requires a vector source
layers[9]: layer "raster-vector-mismatch" requires a raster source
layers[11]: duplicate layer id "duplicate", previously used at line 72
layers[12].type: expected one of [fill, line, symbol, circle, heatmap, fill-extrusion, raster, hillshade, background], "invalid" found
layers[15]: layer "line-gradient-bad" specifies a line-gradient, which requires a GeoJSON source with `lineMetrics` enabled.
layers[16]: layer "line-gradient-good" specifies a line-gradient, which requires a GeoJSON source with `lineMetrics` enabled.
